0xF74B1FFA4A15FBEA.name: SET_ALLOW_STREAM_HEIST_ISLAND_NODES
0xF74B1FFA4A15FBEA.comment: Activates Cayo Perico path nodes if passed `1`. GPS navigation will start working, maybe more stuff will change, not sure. It seems if you try to unload (pass `0`) when close to the island, your game might crash.
